Translations.Text: Dangshi, mu sa dui ta de tongpu shuo:“Wo jiang bu ting bu, zhidao wo daoda liang hai xiangjiao chu, huo jixu luxing ruogan nian.”
Dang ta lia daoda liang hai xiang jiaojie chu de shihou, wangjile ta lia de yu, na wei yu bian ruhai youran er qu
Dang ta lia zou guoqu de shihou, ta dui ta de tongpu shuo:“Na zaofan lai chi! Women queshi pijuanle.”
Ta shuo:“Ni gaosu wo ba, dang women daoda na zuo panshi xia xiuxi de shihou, wo que yi wangjile na wei yu——zhi yin emo wo cai wangjile gaosu ni,——na wei yu ruhai er qu, na zhenshi guaishi!”
Ta shuo:“Zhe zheng shi women suo xunqiu de.” Ta lia jiu yi lai shi de zuji zhuanshen huiqu
Ta lia faxian wo de yige puren, wo yi ba cong wo zheli fachu de enhui shangci ta, wo yi ba cong wo zheli fachu de zhishi chuanshou gei ta
Mu sa dui ta shuo:“Wo yao zhuisui ni, xiwang ni ba ni suo xue de de zhengdao chuanshou wo. Hao ma?”
Ta shuo:“Ni buneng naixin di he wo zai yiqi
Ni meiyou chedi renshi de shiqing ni zenme neng renshou ne?”
Mu sa shuo:“Ruguo an la yiyu, ni jiang faxian wo shi jianren de, bu hui weikang ni de renhe mingling.”
Ta shuo:“Ruguo ni zhuisui wo, name,(yu shi) buyao wen wo shenme daoli, deng wo ziji jiang gei ni ting.”
